metadata.title: CVE-2023-52788 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:i915/perf: Fix NULL deref bugs with drm_dbg() calls When i915 perfinterface is not available dereferencing it will lead to NULL dereferences.As returning -ENOTSUPP is pretty clear return when perf interface is notavailable. [tursulin: added stable tag] (cherry picked from commit36f27350ff745bd228ab04d7845dfbffc177a889)

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
